summary: Makes Dawnguard (faction) armors and weapons craftable.
descriptionHtml:
[Img] http://static-1.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1570904-1388312882.png [/img]
[color=red] Version: [/color] 1.2
[color=red] Author: [/color] ThunderTNT
[color=red] Requirements: [/color] Dawnguard, Latest Skyrim patch

[heading] General Information [/heading]
[list] [color=green] Every version: [/color]
[*]All recipes for enchanted and unechanted (unblessed) Dawnguard armors, axes, hammers and shields have unique ID
[*]If another mod makes any of these items craftable, you might have multiple crafting options for the same item.
[*]Optional 2 and 3 make changes to vanilla crafting recipes for crossbows and bolts, if another mod changes these recipes it will conflict with my mod.
[*]If there is a conflict, load my mod after the conflicting mod to ensure that my changes to crafting recipes remain active.
[/list]

[list] [color=blue] Main File [/color]
[*]Makes Dawnguard faction armors, axes, hammers and shields craftable at Fort Dawnguard
[*][color=yellow] Forge is available after siding with the Dawnguard and recruiting Gunmar [/color]
[/list]

[list] [color=yellow] Optional 1 [/color]
[*]Makes Dawnguard faction armors, axes, hammers and shields craftable at every forge
[/list]

[list] [color=cyan] Optional 2 [/color]
[*]Makes Dawnguard faction armors, axes, hammers and shields craftable at every forge
[*]Steel/dwarven Crossbows, Enhanced Crossbows and Exploding Bolt variants craftable at every forge
[*][color=yellow] To be able to craft Crossbows and exploding bolts, you need to complete certain Dawnguard side missions [/color]
[*][color=red] Makes changes to vanilla crafting recipes for crossbows and exploding bolts, chance to conflict with other mods [/color]
[/list]

[list] [color=red] Optional 3 - Vampire Sider Edition [/color]
[*]Makes Dawnguard faction armors, axes, hammers and shields craftable at every forge
[*]Steel/dwarven Crossbows, Enhanced Crossbows, Bolts and Exploding Bolt variants craftable at every forge
[*][color=red] Makes changes to vanilla crafting recipes for crossbows, bolts and exploding bolts, chance to conflict with other mods [/color]
[*][color=green] Only version that allows crafting all Dawnguard faction items without joining Dawnguard [/color]
[/list]

[heading] Craftables [/heading]

Armors: [color=yellow] Forge category: Miscellaneous [/color]
[list] Armor with scripted enchantments
[*]Dawnguard Cuirass (2 Heavy/3 light)
[*]Dawnguard Gauntlets (Heavy/Light)
[*]Dawnguard Boots (Heavy/Light)
[*]Dawnguard Helmet (Heavy/Light)
[*]Dawnguard Shield (Heavy)
[*]Dawnguard Rune Shield (Light)
[/list]

[list] Armor without enchantments
[*]Unblessed Dawnguard Cuirass (2 Heavy/3 light)
[*]Unblessed Dawnguard Gauntlets (Heavy/Light)
[*]Unblessed Dawnguard Boots (Heavy/Light)
[*]Unblessed Dawnguard Helmet (Heavy/Light)
[*]Unblessed Dawnguard Shield (Heavy)
[*]Unblessed Dawnguard Light Shield (Light)
[/list]

Weapons: [color=yellow] Forge category: Steel [/color]
[list] Weapons with scripted enchantments
[*]Dawnguard Axe
[*]Dawnguard Rune Axe
[*]Dawnguard Hammer
[*]Dawnguard Rune Hammer
[/list]

[list] Weapons without enchantments
[*]Unblessed Dawnguard Axe
[*]Unblessed Dawnguard Rune Axe
[*]Unblessed Dawnguard Hammer
[*]Unblessed Dawnguard Rune Hammer
[/list]

Crossbows and bolts: [color=red] Optionals 2 and 3 [/color]
[list] [color=yellow] Forge category: Steel [/color]
[*]Steel Crossbow
[*]Enhanced Steel Crossbow
[*]Steel Bolt
[*]Exploding Steel Bolt (Fire, Ice and Shock)
[/list]

[list] [color=yellow] Forge category: Dwarven [/color]
[*]Dwarven Crossbow
[*]Enhanced Dwarven Crossbow
[*]Dwarven Bolt
[*]Exploding Dwarven Bolt (Fire, Ice and Shock)
[/list]

[img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1570904-1367431077.png [/img]

[color=red] USE ONLY ONE VERSION OF THIS MOD AT A TIME! [/color]

[heading] NMM install [/heading] [list]
[*]Download Craftable Dawnguard Armory with NMM
[*]Activate mod in mods tab
[/list]

[heading] NMM uninstall [/heading] [list]
[*]Deactivate Craftable Dawnguard Armory with NMM
[/list]

[heading] Manual install [/heading] [list]
[*]Download Craftable Dawnguard Armory archive
[*]Unpack archive
[*]Put the following file from the archive to Skyrim/Data folder
THCraftableDawnguardArmory.esp
[*]Activate .esp with NMM or by going to Skyrim Launcher's Data files.
[/list]

[heading] Manual uninstall [/heading] [list]
[*]Delete following file from Skyrim/Data folder
THCraftableDawnguardArmory.esp
[/list]

[img] http://static-2.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1570904-1367431116.png [/img]
[heading] Future updates [/heading]
-Bug fixes, if needed (no known major bugs at the moment)

[heading] Changelog [/heading]

[list] 1.2
[*]Unenchanted (unblessed) versions of armors and weapons
[*]Changes to crafting recipes to balance unenchanted pieces with enchanted
[/list]

[list] 1.1
[*]Dawnguard weapons craftable
[/list]

[list] 1.0
[*]Initial release
[*]Dawnguard armors craftable
[/list]

[heading] Other [/heading]
Feedback concerning this mod is greatly appreciated, feel free to comment on what you think about this mod, what should be improved etc.

I would like to give my thanks for:
Bethesda, for creating such a great game as Skyrim and providing a Creation Kit for it
Nexus, for a great modding community!
Nexus users, for giving me ideas on how to further enhance this mod

[img] http://static-3.nexusmods.com/15/images/110/1570904-1367431141.png [/img]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21884] Craftable Vampire Armory-Jewelry-Bone Hawk Ring [/url]
